title: KESKO logo - font id
content:
Looking for an ID on this heavy sans serif.

many thanks in advance!  
Danny

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140828224637im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Kesko_logo_RGB_5152.jpeg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Kesko\_logo\_RGB.jpeg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140828224637/http:/typophile.com/files/Kesko_logo_RGB.jpeg) | 11.58 KB |
author: Danny_Miller

comments.content: Can't find a match but... They use [Karbon](http://web.archive.org/web/20140828224637/http:/typophile.com/wiki/https%3A/%252Fklim.co.nz/retail-fonts/karbon) for their [corporate identity](http://web.archive.org/web/20140828224637/http:/www.kesko.fi/Documents/19366-Kesko_Corporate_Responsibility_Report_2012.pdf) and it looks to fit almost perfectly all logo letters except /S. So may be they started with Karbon and tweaked /S.
thanks so much for the help!
